page.title: 16POLITICS
page.content: The area is part of the Rushcliffe Parliameentary Constituency.This is a very safe Conservative seat. The local Member of Parliamennt is Mr. Kenneth Clarke a member of the present cabinet. There is a strong Conservative Association in the locality. The Nottingham County Council is Labour controlled,but the district of Rushcliffe is Conservative. At the local parish level the Conservatives remain strongly in control. The local County Councillor is popular with people of all particular persuasion and sees her role as a helper of people and not merely a political animal. A lot of interest is shown in the activities of Parish Councils.
